Function Documentation

int RSA_sign (  int    type,
const unsigned char *    m,
unsigned int    m_len,
unsigned char *    sigret,
unsigned int *    siglen,
RSA *    rsa
) 
 

Computes RSA Digital Signature.

Parameters:
type  Message digest algo used to generate the digest
m  Text for which signature needs to be computed
m_len  Length of the message
sigret  Signature data returned
siglen  Length of the signature
rsa  RSA structure obtained from oct_rsa_generate_key()
Returns:
Success: 1 Failure: 0

int RSA_verify (  int    dtype,
const unsigned char *    m,
unsigned int    m_len,
unsigned char *    sigbuf,
unsigned int    siglen,
RSA *    rsa
) 
 

Verifies RSA Digital Signature.

Parameters:
dtype  Message digest algo used to generate the digest
m  Text for which signature needs to be computed
m_len  Length of the message
sigbuf  Signature data to be verified
siglen  Length of the signature
rsa  RSA structure obtained from oct_rsa_generate_key()
Returns:
Success: 1 Failure: 0
